api_list.name: /v1/geo/ip2location/{ip}
api_list.description: Resolve the location that's the IP belongs to.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://geo25.p.rapidapi.com/v1/geo/ip2location/123.123.123.123"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "geo25.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://geo25.p.rapidapi.com/v1/geo/ip2location/{ip}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "geo25.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
